articles.title: Interview: Robert Harris Remembers John Le Carré - NPR
articles.description: NPR's Mary Louise Kelly speaks with British writer Robert Harris about the legacy of John le Carré, whom he's called "one of the great post-war British novelists" and who died Saturday at age 89.
articles.content:
John le Carré, master of the spy thriller, has died at the age of 89.
